files.patch:
@@ -1412,2 +1412,11 @@ -

  • To create a Ubuntu-based chroot: -sudo debootstrap \ --arch=arm64 \ --verbose \ --components=main,universe \ --include=fakeroot,symlinks,build-essential,libx11-dev,libxext-dev,libxrender-dev,libxrandr-dev,libxtst-dev,libxt-dev,libcups2-dev,libfontconfig1-dev,libasound2-dev,libfreetype6-dev,libpng-dev,libffi-dev \ --resolve-deps \ jammy \ ~/sysroot-arm64 \ http://ports.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-ports/ # symlinks is in the universe repository

    • +

  • To create a Ubuntu-based chroot:

    +
    sudo debootstrap \
+  --arch=arm64 \
+  --verbose \
+  --components=main,universe \
+  --include=fakeroot,symlinks,build-essential,libx11-dev,libxext-dev,libxrender-dev,libxrandr-dev,libxtst-dev,libxt-dev,libcups2-dev,libfontconfig1-dev,libasound2-dev,libfreetype6-dev,libpng-dev,libffi-dev \
+  --resolve-deps \
+  jammy \
+  ~/sysroot-arm64 \
+  http://ports.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-ports/
+# symlinks is in the universe repository
